description: Grants the user elongated, sharp fingernails that can release razor-sharp wind slashes. The user becomes a sickle human capable of cutting opponents from a distance.

users.circumstances: Eric consumed the fruit at some point before the Warship Island Arc

abilityReveals.description: The user releases razor-sharp wind slashes from their elongated fingernails, creating whirlwind-like cutting attacks that can slice through opponents from a distance.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Eric uses this technique to attack Luffy during the escape from Warship Island.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: The wind slashes allow the user to attack from a distance, giving them a significant advantage in combat.

description: Grants the user the ability to telepathically communicate with animals. The user can understand animal thoughts and convey their own thoughts to animals.

users.circumstances: Apis consumed the fruit at some point before meeting the Straw Hats

abilityReveals.description: The user can telepathically communicate with animals, understanding their thoughts and emotions while conveying their own.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Apis uses this ability to communicate with and comfort Ryu the dragon during the escape.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: The user can communicate with any animal, gathering information and forming bonds with creatures.
